short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deep Link your Zoho CRM, Zoho CRM Plus, Zoho Bign with WhatsApp & Picky Assist Teambox for increased productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrate your WhatsApp with Zoho CRM, Zoho CRM Plus, Zoho Bigin & Picky Assist Teambox for Free

By Installing this extension you will able to deep link WhatsApp & Picky Assist Teambox from any of your Zoho CRM Modules & Sales Signal which helps you and the team to easily see the conversation details in more effective way than ever before.


---Features---- 

✓ Works with All Zoho CRM Modules where data field is Mobile or Phone 
✓ Works with Zoho CRM, Zoho CRM Plus & Zoho Bigin all plans including Free plans.
✓ Integration into Sales Signal Notification for Quick Navigations 
✓ Deep Linking with Picky Assist Teambox, see conversation from Zoho CRM
✓ Feature to add Country Code Prefix if the Zoho CRM data is not added with Country Code 
✓ Mobile Number length validation to dynamically validate length of home country
✓ Mobile number sanitisation like removing 0 from beginning, stripping spaces, hyphens etc from numbers
✓ Option to choose default app i.e WhatsApp Web & Desktop 

--Charges---

This extension is free of cost for all existing Picky Assist Customers and WhatsApp direct integration is free of cost for non Picky Assist Customers as well. 

**Zoho CRM & Picky Assist Teambox will have their own charges**


---Support---

For any issues please contact support@pickyassist.com or join our Facebook Community to ask questions https://facebook.com/groups/pickyassist

---Privacy----

By Installing this extension we don't collect or store any of your informations in our server, you may refer our standard privacy polices here https://pickyassist.com/resources/Privacy-Picky.pdf

---Trademark----

WhatsApp & Zoho CRM trademarks belongs to their respective legal companies. Logo & Name used here only for demonstrate purpose without any trademark violations
